settings.header: We’d like to hear from you!
settings.copy: Have a question? We’re here for you! If you are contacting us in regards to an order please have a look at our FAQs page first. If you can’t find the answer there, please be sure to include your order number in your form or email.
settings.business_address: 9454 Wilshire Blvd Suite 300 Beverly Hills, CA 90212
settings.form_header: Get in touch with your questions and comments or drop us a line by filling out our online form.
